name: The guide of prison gate
description:
U NEED ESCAPE BUT, BOOK TOO (I mean u need book too xD)

The game isn't done yet cuz I got ill and mama said turn u fu** pc down, haha)

Okay, a game about jail but as I said u need to find a book, why? Cuz door under look and u can't open without a guide book.

P.S. It's an annoying platformer lol)
